channel.title: Begin at cows
channel.description: i already have it where you spawn at cows, and cows spawned i basically want a guide there (npc) to show either screenshots or live aspects of the server in detail. for instance showing torm demons and showing a little narration, after the person clicks to continue, goes to another part of the server, i have a PI source any help would be nice, open to everything

item.title: Begin at cows
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

hmm. anyone ever played newrune? i want the beginning sort of like that. just to show how my server is.

Read full topic

item.title: Begin at cows
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Of course you can move the camera server side.

public void stillCamera(int x, int y, int height, int speed, int angle) {
		c.outStream.createFrame(177);
		c.outStream.writeByte(x / 64);
		c.outStream.writeByte(y / 64);
		c.outStream.writeWord(height);
		c.outStream.writeByte(speed);
		c.outStream.writeByte(angle);
	}

	public void spinCamera(int x, int y, int height, int speed, int angle) {
		c.outStream.createFrame(166);
		c.outStream.writeByte(x);
		c.outStream.writeByte(y);
		c.outStream.writeWord(height);
		c.outStream.writeByte(speed);
		c.outStream.writeByte(angle);
	}

	public void resetCamera() {
		c.outStream.createFrame(107);
		c.updateRequired = true;
		c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	}







if (command.startsWith("checking")) {
			c.stillCamera(3200, 3345, 0002, 0001, 0001);
			
		}
		
		if (command.startsWith("ended")) {
			c.resetCamera();
			
		}







Normal camera

Code:
stillCamera(0001, 0001, 0001, 0001, 0001);
Spinning camera

Code:
spinCamera(0001, 0001, 0001, 0001, 0001);


To end the camera view simply add frame107 under where you want it to end
Add the code BELOW to end the camera view:
Code:
resetCamera();

Read full topic

item.title: Begin at cows
item.dc:creator: @SnowBoarder7 SnowBoarder7
item.description:
@SnowBoarder7 wrote:

Make a boolean and set it to true if the character file gets created.
If the boolean above is true, teleport to first area, send a message box.
After the message box is gone, send to next area, send a message box.
etc

That’s an easy way to do it without editing the users client, as I don’t think you can move the camera server-side.

Read full topic

item.title: Begin at cows
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

You could create a “cutscene” like creativescape does upon first login. canWalk(false); and then have the camera pan and teleport the player around the world.

You will need to add all the methods though.

Read full topic
